metadata.description:
**Honan Ember of Sorrowmoor is Legend Maps Adventurer #1.** 
 Legend Maps Adventurer NFTs have a unique combination of traits and attributes, and provide the template for playable characters in the Legend Maps roguelike dungeon crawler game. 

 **Alternate Formats:** 
 [Character Card](https://legendmaps.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/QmWyAMcuqYT9yepfCwt77KywNmm1NHATFGxaXsywdekxyq/char_card_1.png) , [Adventurer with transparent background](https://legendmaps.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/Qmc6PbAZuvQy7rv1hfNMyF1yujakYvBqMEmtPpntyEY2Tb/tp_portrait_1.png) 

 Learn more at [legendmaps.io](http://legendmaps.io/)
metadata.name: Honan Ember of Sorrowmoor

traits.description: Bonus when attempting to disarm traps.
Extra health in maps with ice biome or walls.
